column1: Appendix table 5. Standard errors for table 7: Cumulative percent of state prisoners released in 22 states in 2008 who had an arrest after release that led to a conviction, by sex, race or ethnicity, age at release, and year following release
Report title: Recidivism of Prisoners Released in 24 States in 2008: A 10-Year Follow-Up Period (2008–2018)  NCJ 256094
Data source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Recidivism of State Prisoners Released in 2008 data collection, 2008–2018
Authors: Leonardo Antenangeli, Ph.D., and Matthew R. Durose, BJS Statisticians

Appendix table 5. Standard errors for table 7: Cumulative percent of state prisoners released in 22 states in 2008 who had an arrest after release that led to a conviction, by sex, race or ethnicity, age at release, and year following release
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Recidivism of State Prisoners Released in 2008 data collection, 2008–2018.
